title: 8/30/17 - Be a human being first, a political animal last (Jason Buttrill from The Blaze & Jeff Mudgett join Glenn)
description:
Time for the media to get over itself ...The countless heroes in the Houston area ...Will Houston ever recover fully from Hurricane Harvey? ...Is Joel Osteen as happy as he seems and is he getting a raw deal in the press? ...Jason Buttrill shares his eyewitness account of seeing Harvey's devastation yesterday ...Jeff Mudgett, the Great-great grandson of serial killer H.H. Holmes discusses his theory on who Jack The Ripper was.

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
